tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loan_approval_processes (
    loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name TEXT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    credit_score INT,
    approval_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE LoanApplications (
  application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
  applicant_age INT,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  credit_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE loan_applications (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
applicant_name VARCHAR(50),
applicant_email VARCHAR(100),
loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
credit_score INT, 
approval_status BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE credit_scores (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
applicant_id INT,
credit_score INT, 
score_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE approval_criteria (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
criteria_name VARCHAR(50),
criteria_description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE loans (
  loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  loan_status VARCHAR(50),
  approval_criteria JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE credit_scores (
  score_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_id UUID,
  credit_score INTEGER,
  credit_rating VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE loan_criteria (
  criteria_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  criteria_name VARCHAR(100),
  min_credit_score INTEGER,
  max_loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE approvals (
  approval_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  loan_id UUID,
  approver_id UUID,
  approval_date TIMESTAMP,
  approved_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE approvers (
  approver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  approver_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  approval_limit DECIMAL(10,2)
)
